alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Susquehanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:37AM EST until December 18 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Chemung County in central New York... Southeastern Schuyler County in central New York... Tioga County in central New York... Southern Tompkins County in central New York... Bradford County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southwestern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 200 PM EST. * At 837 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Chemung, Ithaca, Elmira, Sayre, Waverly, Owego, Athens, Towanda, Canton, Watkins Glen, Tunkhannock, Montour Falls, Troy, Wyalusing, Odessa, West Elmira, Falls, Muhlenberg, Southport and Barton. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
